extends java.lang.Object

      • readTaxRate

        public static double[] readTaxRate()
                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads the file with tax rate information and returns tax rate. Index 0 is federal, index 1 is state.
        Returns:
        tax rates
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - thrown if file cannot be opened
